text: Pabillonis (Pabillònis) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,781 people lived there. Its area is 37.42 km². It is 42 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Pabillonis
